title: The Real Estate Cheat Code
hook: Stop guessing how much your neighbor pays for rent. Here is how to find out instantly.
body:
Visual: Split screen. Top: Confused person looking at a condo. Bottom: Screen recording of OneMap App.

Audio: 'Most people use Google Maps, but they are missing the money features. Open OneMap, switch to the Property layer, and tap on ANY building.'

Visual: Fast-paced zooming into a specific building, tapping a unit, and revealing a list of recent transaction prices and rental rates.

Audio: 'You get exact transaction data, square footage prices, and rental history. Don't sign a lease until you check this.'
callToAction: Download OneMap before your next viewing.
